## jx upgrade plugins

Upgrades all of the plugins in your local Jenkins X CLI

### Usage

```
jx upgrade plugins
```

### Synopsis

Upgrades all of the plugins in your local Jenkins X CLI

### Examples

  # upgrades your plugin binaries
  jx upgrade plugins

### Options

```
  -h, --help        help for plugins
  -m, --mandatory   if set lets ignore optional plugins
```

* [jx upgrade](jx_upgrade.md)	 - Upgrades resources
